meanings.definition: The state of being obsolete or outdated.
meanings.sent1: The obsolescences of old technology can be seen in the museum.
meanings.sent2: Many companies struggle with the obsolescences of their products in a fast-paced market.
meanings.sent3: The obsolescences of the VHS tapes made the kids laugh at how big they were.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion choices reflected the obsolescences of past decades.
meanings.sent5: The obsolescences of the typewriter were evident when compared to modern computers.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming obsolete or outdated.
meanings.sent1: We witnessed the obsolescences of the old phone as the new model was released.
meanings.sent2: The obsolescences of software happen quickly in the tech industry.
meanings.sent3: The obsolescences of the old car were evident when it struggled to start.
meanings.sent4: The obsolescences of traditions can be challenging to navigate in a changing world.
meanings.sent5: The obsolescences of the factory machinery led to a decrease in production.
